name: Crazy Balloon 2000
overview: Crazy Balloon was first released in 1980 as an arcade machine by Taito. This is a game of strategy and skill! The object of Crazy Balloon is to guide a delicate swaying balloon through a maze of pin wheel obstacles. The PlayStation version, released in Japan as part of the SuperLite 1500 budget-oriented series from Success, features the DualShock vibration function and 2 different game modes: The original game, and an arrangement mode that features remastered graphics.
